name: mahalliybaza
description: Firebasega uslubidagi, offalyn, mahalliy ma'lumotlar bazasi.

scripts.bundle-dev: browserify --standalone Localbase index.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] > dist/localbase.dev.js
scripts.bundle-prod: browserify -p [ tinyify --no-flat ] --standalone Localbase index.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production ] > dist/localbase.min.js
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle-dev && npm run bundle-prod

author: Otabek Sadiridinov
